title: @KateyKhaos, can you fix Project Ashe's ult, please?
body: A lot of people are complaining that her arrow is too hard to see. Can you brighten it up a bit?

replies.body: PROJECT: Ashe's arrow is absurd. The first time I saw it, I didn't even know she ulted. It ended up getting me killed. Honestly her UAV (e) and ultimate look very similar and have similar particle effects. Its a bit distracting.

Hey! We're discussing the pain points [listed in this thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/PHPzMzrh-project-ashes-arrow-needs-to-be-more-visible-on-summoners-rift?comment=00230007) and are discussing the best way to solve for the issues.
